She would like to meet all her customers' demands at the affordable prices she offers. Someday she hopes to construct a more convenient stall to stock more grocery items and keep offering friendly service to her customers. This will also enable her to achieve financial stability someday.

loans.use: to buy instant noodles, shampoo, canned goods, bread, and eggs for resale.

loans.name: Mirzojon

texts.ru: Mирзочон-51летний мужчина,с высшим медицинским образованием.Отец 4х детей,работает на районной больнице врачом терапевтом.У него много своих клиентов,так как в селах он очень востребован и таких кадров там не очень много.Дополнительным доходом семьи является откорм коз и овец и держит свой скот у себя дома.В горах сейчас много травы и начинается сезон в животноводстве,он решил взять небольшой кредит и закупить еще несколько голов.По рекомендации своих соседей он обратился к нам и наши условия понравились ему.На полученный кредит он хочет купит овец или ангорских коз.
texts.en: Mirzojon is a 51 year-old man, who has a higher medical education.  He is a father of four children, works at the district hospital as a therapist.  He has many patients because he is in high demand in the villages due to the fact that there are not many such professionals there.  The family's additional income comes from fattening up goats and sheep that Mirzojon keeps at home.  There is a lot grass in the mountains now, and the animal husbandry season is starting; thus, he decided to obtain a small loan and buy several heads of livestock.  Based on his neighbors' advice, he came to us and liked our terms.  Mirzojon wants to use this loan to buy sheep or angora goats.

loans.use: to buy sheep or goats

loans.name: Karim

texts.ru: Карим женат, имеет двоих детей. Первому 5  лет а второму 2 годика. Жена домохозяйка и присматривает за детьми. Карим начинал свой бизнес 2 года назад с продажи постельного белья, постепенно расширяя бизнес, добавил новый ассортимент товара: полотенца, покрывала и подушки. Его бизнес прибыльный и у данного бизнеса нету сезонности. Карим запрашивает займ для покупки товара с целью увлечения оборотного капитала. Лето период свадеб и потребность на данные товары возрастает. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту. Cпасибо!
texts.en: Karim is married and has two children, the first of whom is five years old and the second is two years old.  His wife is a homemaker and watches after the children.  Karim started his business two years ago with the sales of bedding, then gradually expanded his business by adding new merchandise selection: towels, blankets and pillows.  His business is profitable and is not seasonal.  Karim is requesting this loan to buy merchandise in order to increase his working capital.  Summer is the period of weddings, and the demand for this merchandise increases.  He relies on your help and kindness.  Thank you!

loans.use: to buy new merchandise

loans.name: Komil

texts.ru: Комил женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Сын родился в 2012 году, а дочка родилась в 2010 года. Жена является учительницей средней школы, преподает таджикский язык и  литературу. Комил работает в таджикской алюминиевой компании- электриком. Он в этой сфере работает уже более 37 лет. В связи большими осадками в этом году от сырости  стены дома требуют ремонта. Для этого он обратился  в «ИМОН Интернешнл» за помощью. Комил запрашивает займ для ремонта своего дома. Он использует займ для покупки цемента, камней, песка, грунта и кирпича. Комил надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Komil is married and has two children.  His son was born in 2012, and the daughter was born in 2010.  Komil's wife is a teacher at a secondary school; she teaches Tajik language and literature.  Komil works as an electrician at a Tajik aluminum company.  He has been working in this area for many years.  Due to a lot of rain this year, the walls of his house got saturated and need to be repaired.  This is why Komil came to "IMON International" for help.  Komil is requesting this loan to repair his house.  He will use the loan to buy cement, stones, sand, gravel and bricks.  Komil relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to repair his house

loans.name: Security Group

texts.en:
Zubeda, who is in her mid 40s, is married with five children, two of whom are still in school and three of whom are grown-ups. Zubeda has been running several small businesses. She has been selling clothes door-to-door and selling local ice cream and ice cubes for six years. She works from 10:00 a.m. to 12 noon (for two hours only) and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be her 1st loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She wants to use the loan to buy more clothes, local ice cream, and ice cubes for resale.  Her dream is to be able to build her own house one day.

She will share this loan with her loan group, "Security," which has a total of 15 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy more clothes, local ice cream, and ice cubes.

loans.name: Sokhorn

texts.en:
Sokhorn, 37, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been selling vegetables for more than ten years, earning approximately 5 U.S. dollars (USD) per day. Her husband runs a public-transportation service (motor taxi) and also earns about 5 USD per day.

Sokhorn is requesting a loan of 1000 USD to purchase a threshing machine for rental. This purchase will enable her to improve her family's livelihood by generating more income to support the family. In the future, Sokhorn would like to rebuild her present house to make it stronger so she can provide convenient living conditions for the family. She would also like to help her children get a bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase a threshing machine for rental

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.fr: La cliente, Présidente et promoteur du groupe de crédit  Cherubin, Femme  dynamique, entrepreneur expérimentée, âgée de 31 ans. Elle est  vendeuse de denrées alimentaires. Son mari est  quincaillier. Elle a commencé son business en s’entraidant avec son mari. Plus tard, elle constitua son capital et trouva son autonomie. Il ya 4 mois qu’elle  fut informée de micro crédit qu’octroi l’IMF Hekima, immédiatement, elle a pris de contact utile avec les responsables de la dite organisation. Ainsi, elle bénéficia son premier crédit de 50$ pour renforcer  ses affaires. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  150 kg de farine de manioc, les sels, les tomates, etc.  En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir. La cliente remercie Hekima pour  les actions d’autonomisation de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique. Il sied de signaler que certaines clientes portent leurs bébés
texts.en:
This client is the president and promoter of the loan group Cherubin. An energetic woman and experienced entrepreneur, she is 31 years old and a food seller. Her husband deals in hardware. She started her business with her husband's help. Later on, she built up her own capital and discovered self-sufficiency. 

Four months ago, she was informed about microloans, which the microfinance institution Hekima awards. Right away, she contacted the officials of the aforementioned organization with useful results.

Thus, she benefited from her first loan of $50 for bolstering her business. This new loan must serve to supply her with 150 kg of cassava flour, salt, tomatoes, etc. In addition, she wishes to see her children grown up. 

This client thanks Hekima for its actions helping poor women excluded from traditional banks to become autonomous. 

It is appropriate to indicate that come of the clients are carrying their babies.

loans.use: to pay for 150 kg of cassava flour, salt, tomatoes, etc.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Byamba

texts.en:
Borrower Byamba is a 54-year-old widow who has two daughters. She lives with her daughters in the outer ger district, which lacks the basic infrastructure of Ulaanbaatar City. She supports her family by operating a clothing-sale business at the second-largest outdoor market of the city.

Byamba is requesting a loan of 1,000,000 Mongolian tugriks (MNT) to purchase clothes to sell for this spring season. She is a trusted client of Transcapital Co. Ltd.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes for resale

loans.name: Lour

texts.en: Lour, 49, is married and resides with her husband and eight children in Kampong Chnang Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in an agricultural business for over twenty years. They have extensive experience and are successful in their career. They are involved in growing rice and fattening up cattle. They earn approximately USD 3 per day. Five of her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about USD 18 per day. Due to the difficulty in pumping water into her rice field, Lour is requesting a loan of USD 1,500 to purchase a water pump. This purchase would enable her to reduce the operating costs in her farming work and get a higher yield. In the future, she would like to expand her agricultural business and help her children get bachelor's degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and stronger to provide convenient living conditions for the family.

loans.use: to purchase a water pump

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is 41 and is married with six children, aged between 3 and 18 years old. She sells clothes and has been in this business for five years.

Alice has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more clothes to sell. With any profits, she will be able to save for her future and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To purchase more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Sreng

texts.en:
Sreng, 30, is a resident from Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. She lives with her husband and two school-aged children. She has devoted herself to an agricultural business, cultivating rice crops on her own farmland. Her husband is supportive in helping her all the way whether she works in or outdoors. Besides rice husbandry, this couple is involved in another type of business, which is to make and sell small mills (mortar made of hard wood) for  a profit. 

In order to sustain the second business of the family, Sreng is taking out a loan to purchase raw stones for the mill making business. This loan will improve her household income. With the generated profit, Sreng will support her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase raw stones for her mill making business.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is a 39-year-old married gentleman with 7 children. He deals in a "first-hand" (new) clothes business which he has run for a period of 6 years. He started in agriculture, then local brewing, and finally the clothing business. He says that inadequate capital and high taxes are affecting the business. Joseph would like to educate his children and expand his business to new markets. He wants a loan to buy clothes for sale during the Easter season.

loans.use: to buy clothes for sale during the Easter season.

loans.name: Claudio

texts.en: Claudio is a 38-year-old gentleman who is married with 4 children. He has a retail business that he has run for 1 year. He started in agriculture, then went into the boda boda (bicycle taxi) and produce businesses, and finally got the capital to start a retail business. He says inadequate capital is affecting the business and wants a loan to buy sugar, salt, and baking powder for resale. Claudio would like to educate his children, expand his business to new markets, and buy land for growing crops.

loans.use: to buy sugar, salt, and baking powder for resale.

loans.name: Maimouna

texts.fr:
Madame Maimouna est une dame âgée de 43 ans, mariée et mère de famille. Elle s’active dans le commerce depuis plus de 30 ans maintenant, car elle a démarré dès l’âge très jeune.
Elle est à son 3ème crédit à l’IMCEC et aimerait avoir un renouvellement pour  acheter de la marchandise et satisfaire sa clientèle. Avec le crédit, elle va se procurer des tissus, des chaussures et des bijoux qu’elle va revendre dans le voisinage.
Maimouna n’a pas de charges et travaille pour diversifier les produits et services. Et cela, elle le fait pour  vivre elle et son foyer dans le confort.
texts.en:
Maimouna is a 43-year-old woman who is married and has a family.  She has been involved in retail business for more than thirty years already, having started at a very young age.

This is her third loan with UIMCEC and she is counting on this renewed loan to buy some goods and to meet the needs of her customers.  With her loan, she will buy fabrics, shoes and jewelry, which she will resell in her neighborhood.

Maimouna has no expenses and works in order to diversify products and services.  Her goal is to provide comfortable living conditions to her family.

loans.use: to buy shoes, fabrics and jewelry for resale.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en: Juliet is a 26-year-old lady who has a stationery business. She started the business with capital from her father and has operated it for 2 years. She faces problems of inadequate capital to facilitate the business and customers not paying on time. She wants a loan to buy books, pens, and reams of paper for resale. She would like mostly to build a permanent home. She would also like to move her business to a more permanent location.

loans.use: to buy books, pens, and reams of paper for resale.

loans.name: Yoronimu

texts.en: Yoronimu is a 40-year-old resident of Kagadi. He has been in the transport business for 2 years. He says he started by driving the neighbors’ taxi, then decided to buy it at a reduced price. His business is affected by high fuel costs and taxes. He wants a loan to buy tires for his vehicle. He would like to work hard to ensure that his children are educated and would like to buy land for growing crops.

loans.use: to buy tires for his vehicle.

loans.name: Kennedy

texts.en: Kennedy is 21 years old and does carpentry to earn a living. He has been in the business for 3 years and has employed one person. He describes his business environment as good because there is limited competition. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his living standards and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for a loan of 9,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to buy timber for making furniture.

loans.use: to buy timber for making furniture

loans.name: Batjantsan

texts.en: Batjantsan is a 47-year-old married man who lives with his family in an outer ger (Mongolian housing tent) district that lacks basic infrastructure in Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia. He is a security man at a local high school. Since last year, he has managed to build a new house and he wants to finish it this spring. Therefore, he is requesting a 800,000 Mongolian Tugriks (MNT) loan to purchase some necessary construction materials.

loans.use: to purchase housing materials.

loans.name: Francine Semanou

texts.fr: Francine Semanou est mariée et sans enfant. Elle n'a personne à charge. Elle vend les articles de mercerie, ustensiles de cuisine et autres depuis cinq ans. Francine Semanou s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés de la place. Elle s'entretient avec une clientèle variée. Francine Semanou veut augmenter son stock, elle désire également participer à la charge familiale avec ses économies.
texts.en:
Francine Semanou is married and does not have any children.  She has no dependent.  She has been selling sewing supplies, kitchen utensils, and other goods for five years.  She buys her merchandise at one of the local markets and has a diverse customer base.  

Francine Semanou wants to increase her stock of goods and to contribute to family expenses using her savings.

loans.use: to buy 30 items for sewing and one large bag of used clothing in bulk.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is 40 years old and married with four children. He does a motorcycle-transport business to earn a living. He has been in the business for three years and describes his business environment as competitive because many people do the same business. To earn extra income, he does masonry. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to educate his children and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for a 20,000 Kenya Shillings loan to buy a motorbike.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike.

loans.name: Anthony

texts.en:
Anthony is a 39-year-old resident of Kagadi who has eight children and operates a business selling clothes. He started by practicing agriculture, then got capital for the current business, now operating for eight years. Price fluctuations and high fuel and transport costs are factors affecting his operations. He would like to educate his children, and for the business, he would like to expand to new markets. 

Anthony wants a loan to buy more clothes during the Easter season for sale.

loans.use: to buy more clothes during the Easter season for sale.

loans.name: Moustapha

texts.fr:
L’emprunteur s’appelle Moustapha, il loge à environ 22 km de la ville principale, un petit village qui tend vers la popularité grâce à son marché de légumes. Moustapha est un agriculteur depuis 20 ans. Il est marié et père de 4 enfants. Il est à son 3ème crédit à l’IMCEC et aimerait renouveler  pour acheter des semences .Et pour cela, il a besoin de 500000F CFA pour pouvoir acheter 7 pots de semences de choux, 30 sacs de fumier, 8 litres de gasoil. 
Avec les bénéfices de son exploitation il réussi à entretenir sa femme et ses enfants, mais aussi sa maman. Il aimerait agrandir son exploitation et son fond de roulement dans l’avenir afin de mieux gérer l’exploitation.
texts.en:
Moustapha lives about 22 kilometers from the main town in a small village that tends to attract attention thanks to its vegetable market.  Moustapha has been a farmer for 20 years.  He is married and the father of four children.  This will be his third loan via IMCEC with which he would like to purchase seeds.  To this end, he will need 500,000F CFA for the purchase of 7 pots of cabbage seeds, 30 sacks of manure, and 8 liters of fuel.

With the profits of his work, he is able to take care of his wife and children as well as his mother.  He would like to expand his operation and woking capital in the future in order to better manage his business.

loans.use: to purchase cabbage seeds, manure, and fuel for his farming operations.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is 34 years old and married with two children. He runs a retail shop to earn a living. He has been in the business for three years and describes his business environment as favorable because there is limited competition. To earn extra income, he does maize farming. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to grow his business and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy sugar, rice, cooking oil and maize flour to sell.

loans.use: To buy sugar, rice, cooking oil and maize flour to sell.

loans.name: Marhabo

texts.ru: Мархабо замужем и на воспитании имеет одну дочку. Супруг работает в Российской Федерации. Мархабо очень трудолюбивая и добрая женщина. Более 5 лет  она работает продавцом в продуктовом магазине. Она мечтает о том, чтобы создать уют и комфорт в своем доме, и с этой целью запрашивает займ в размере 4000 Сомони для покупки строительных материалов для ремонта своего дома. Она надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Marhabo is married and she is raising one daughter. Her husband works in the Russian Federation. Marhabo is a very hardworking and kind woman. She has been working as a salesperson in a grocery store for more than five years.  Her dream is to make her house comfortable, and to this end, she is requesting a loan of 4,000 somoni for the purchase of building materials to repair her house.  She looks forward to your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Mirzohamid

texts.ru: Мирохамид трудолюбивый и добросовестный семьянин. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Более 10 лет Мирзохамид занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. Он начинал свой бизнес с выращивания пшеницы.  Мирзохамид запрашивает займ в размере 10000 Сомони для покупки минеральных удобрений для обработки земли. Мирзохамид надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Mirzohamid is a hardworking and conscientious family man. He is married and raising three children.  He has been involved in agriculture for more than ten years, starting with the cultivation of wheat.  He is requesting a loan of 10,000 somoni for the purchase of mineral fertilizers to cultivate his land.  He is looking forward to your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Sobir

texts.ru: Собирчон молодой парень- недавно вернулся из заработков.Он женат и имеет одного ребенка.Живет с родителями и помогает семье своим вкладом,зарабатывая разнорабочим. Так как в селах   мало работы,основной доход-это животноводство,семья клиента тоже постоянно держат дома скот.Первый раз в нашу организацию обратился отец Собира и получил кредит на покупку скота.Им понравилась наша процедура и они будучи нашими клиентами намного улучшили свои условия жизни.Отец Собира уехал за пределы города и чтобы не прерывать свой стаж в нашей компании, он вместо себя оставил своего сына и до сих пор в течении 3х лет он кредитуется у нас.
texts.en: Sobirjon is a young man who has recently returned from working abroad. He is married and has one child. He lives with parents and helps his family with income earning as a laborer. Because there's little work in the villages the main income comes from animal husbandry and the applicant's family keeps the cattle at home all the time. Sobir's father came first to our organization and received a loan to buy cattle. They liked our process and by being our clients they have greatly improved their living conditions. Sobir's father has left town and so not to interrupt his standing record with our organization has brought his son instead who has been receiving loans for three years.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Mirzorahim

texts.ru: Мирзорахим -вдовец,имеет 4х детей.Двое старших сыновей имеют свои семьи и живут отдельно от отца Далеко  в горах.Эти места очень удобны для содержания скота,так как сейчас очень много травы. в горах и начинается сезон в животноводстве.Сам Мирзорахим живет в другом районе и живет с младшими детьми и зарабатывает на проживание таксистом.Хочет купить корову и отправить сыну в горы,чтобы в семье было молоко.Пришел в нашу организацию по совету своих родственников.Надеется что будет работать с нами долгие годы.
texts.en:
Mirzorahim is a a widower.  He has four children. Two of his oldest sons have their own families and live independently in the mountains.  The area where they live is good for raising livestock, especially now that there is an abundance of grass.  This time of year is the beginning of the season for animal husbandry. 

Mirzorahim himself lives with his younger children in another region, earning a living as a taxi driver.  He wants to buy a cow and to send it to his son in the mountains, so that the family can have milk.  

Mirzorahim came to our organization following the advice of his relatives.  He is hoping to work with us for many years to come.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Mashekwa

texts.en:
Maamba is a small mining village where 21-year-old Mashekwa runs his mobile money transfer business. The small profits he earns he sends home to his parents who still work on the family farm. 
Mashekwa describes his business as the cheapest and easiest way for people to send and receive money to their loved ones. He says the services he offers have been well received in Maamba because his business is welcoming and as such he has been able to integrate very well in the community.   From the time he started, Mashekwa has increased the number of customers he has each day from 10 to 20. The number of customers he can have in a day is limited to the amount of working capital he has. This means that Mashekwa is not able to serve customers who want to send or receive money that is larger than his working capital of $500. This means that Mashekwa loses out on profits and disappoint his customers.
He has hopes of seeing his business grow to greater heights. Someday, he would like to open more mobile money transfers outlets in other rural areas.
When he gets his Kiva loan, he would like to use the money to increase his working capital.  This will enable him to make more profit to send home to his parents.

loans.use: To increase his working capital.  This will enable him to serve more customers and give  him more profit to send home to his parents.

loans.name: Aide Del Rocio

texts.es: Aida de 42 años vive (isla Guayaquil ). Ella empezó a trabajar se posesiono de este negocio porque se dio cuenta de la necesidad de la gente de su barrio. Eso le dio oportunidad de tener mayor ingreso económico.  Tiene su bazar vende Avon y taxi amigo. Trabaja todos los días con su hijo es casada tiene hijos. A futuro anhela ampliar su negocio. Con el préstamo comprara (utiles escolares, cosmeticos).
texts.en: Aida is 42 years old and she lives in Isla Guayaquil. Taking notice of people's needs in her neighborhood, she has started engaging in her activity, thus giving herself the chance to make more money. She runs a small store where she sells various items such as Avon products, and she takes calls for a private taxi service. She is married and she has three children, and she works every day with one of them. In the future she wants to expand her activity. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy school supplies and cosmetics.

loans.use: To buy school supplies and cosmetics.

loans.name: Asociación De Mujeres Agroindustriales De San Pedro Group

texts.es:
Asociación de Mujeres Agroindustriales de San Pedro

500.000

2012-62


La Asociación de Mujeres Agroindustriales de San Pedro de Trojas se funda en Marzo de 1997 adquiriendo una finca del Instituto de Desarrollo Agrario, la cual cancelaron en un período de 10 años. El grupo está conformada por 6 mujeres que se dedican a la siembra en invernadero de hortalizas tales como tomate, vainica, chile dulce además de tener producción de café en su finca. El objetivo del grupo es obtener un ingreso adicional, por medio del fomento de actividades agroindustriales y además beneficiar a las familias de la comunidad con proyectos productivos acordes con los conceptos de conservación y uso racional de los recursos.

Entre las principales actividades de la Asociación están: 

1.	Coordinar con el Ministerio de Agricultura, el Instituto de Desarrollo Agrario y otras instituciones públicas de Costa Rica para obtener el servicio de asistencia técnica, que estas instituciones brindan.
2.	Producción de chile dulce, tomate, almacigo de chile, vainicas y otros productos, producidos bajo medio controlado (invernadero) para la comercialización y generación de ingresos.
3.	Mantenimiento de una finca de café, propiedad de la Asociación, la cual representa un ingreso anual fijo.


Su principal prioridad fue conseguir un lugar donde poder desarrollar agricultura orgánica, ellas cuentan con una finca en la zona de San Pedro de Valverde Vega, cantón de la provincia de Alajuela, ubicada en el Valle Central de Costa Rica, en las faldas del Volcán Poas. Incentivando a la mujer en su desarrollo como empresaria. 

La Asociación es propietaria de la finca y la infraestructura de invernaderos con la que cuentas, tienen jornadas de trabajo entre sus socias, las cuales pueden apoyar el proyecto y al mismo tiempo atender a sus familias, genera un ingreso complementario a su hogar y permite apoyar el estudio de sus hijos y mejora la calidad de vida de sus integrantes. La inversión requerida en este momento es para cambiar el suelo de los invernaderos que se encuentran desgastados y han generado una disminución en el rendimiento de los productos sembrados, y aque llegaron al final de su vida útil.

 Misión:
La Asociación busca su propio desarrollo sostenible, el de las asociadas y sus familias, utilizando para ello la diversificación agroindustrial, nuevas tecnologías de producción, para ofrecer al mercado comprador diversos productos de calidad, logrando así nuevos mercados y oportunidades de desarrollo.

Visión:
Ser una organización autogestionaria de mujeres que por medio de la diversificación de actividades agroindustriales, genera oportunidades para el desarrollo socio-económico de sus familias.
texts.en:
Asociación de Mujeres Agroindustriales de San Pedro  500.000  2012-62

The Association of Women Farmers of San Pedro de Trojas was founded in March 1997,  when it acquired a farm from the Institute of Farm Development which it has paid for over a ten-year period.  The group is comprised of six women who grow greenhouse vegetables such as tomatoes, green beans, sweet pepper, as well as coffee.  The group's goal is to obtain additional income through the farm activities to help community families with productive projects aimed at conservation and rational use of resources.

The main activities of the Association are:

1.  Coordination with the Ministry of Agriculture, Institute of Farm Development and other public institutions of Costa Rica to obtain technical assistance services offered by these institutions.
2.  Production of sweet pepper, tomato, chili pepper, green beans, and other products grown in a greenhouse setting, to be sold in order to generate income.
3.  Maintenance of a coffee plantation, owned by the Association, which represents a fixed annual income.

Its top priority was to obtain a place to develop organic agriculture.  The women own a farm in San Pedro de Valverde Vega, a canton in the province of Alajuela, situated in the central valley of Costa Rica, on the lower slope of the Poas Volcano.  It encourages development of women entrepreneurs.

The Association is the owner of the farm and its greenhouse infrastructure.  The members share workdays and support the project while attending to their families and generating an additional income for the household, contributing to their children's education and improving their families' lifestyles.  The investment required on this occasion is to change the greenhouse soil which is no longer fertile and at the end of its life span, meaning production has decreased.

Mission:
The Association seeks its own sustainable development, that of its members and families, using agroindustrial diversification and new production technologies to offer the buying market a variety of quality products, expanding into new markets and development opportunities.

Vision:
To be an organization self-managed by women who, through diverse agroindustrial activities, generate opportunities for the socio-economic development of their families.

loans.use: To plant greenhouse tomatoes and other vegetables; after changing the greenhouse soil which is no longer fertile.

location.town: Alajuela, San Pedro de Valverde Vega

loans.name: Germán

texts.es: Germán de 49 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad. Él es un hombre que se caracteriza por ser muy emprendedor, trabajador, higiénico y responsable. El señor Germán se dedica a la venta de panes (Hot dogs), dicha actividad la realiza de manera ambulante desde hace ya varios años. Tiene muy buenas referencias de sus vecinos, los cuales lo prefieren por ser un hombre carismático con muy buenas relaciones interpersonales. Ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas que cada día lo prefieren más. El vive en condiciones muy humildes las cuales poco a poco desea cambiar. Para lograr su sueño trabaja duramente  para alcanzar un estilo de vida diferente en el futuro. Con mucho optimismo se acerco a esta institución para solicitar este crédito, ya que desea  invertir en la compra de los principales insumos (pan, salchicha, mayonesa, salsa de tomate, mostaza, etc.)  para  preparar los deliciosos panes. Espera alcanzar un aumento en las ventas e ingresos y poder así tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Germán, 49, lives in his own house.  He is known for being very enterprising, hard-working, hygienic and responsible.  Germán is a street vendor who has been selling hot dogs for several years.   He has very good references among his neighbors who prefer his business because he is a charismatic man with very good interpersonal skills.  He has been able to gain the trust of the many people who seek him out more and more.  

He lives in very humble conditions and would like to change his situation little by little.  To reach his goal he works hard to be able to attain a different lifestyle in the future.  With much optimism he came to our institution to request a loan which he plans to use to buy the main food ingredients (bread, hot dogs, mayonnaise, ketchup, mustard, etc.) to make his delicious sandwiches.  He hopes to increase his sales and income to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy bread, hot dogs, mayonaisse, ketchup, mustard, etc.

loans.name: Yuldash

texts.ru: Юлдаш занимается торговлями строительных материалов. Ему 49 лет , женат. Имеет два сына и два дочь.   Один сын  помогает ему в этой бизнес деятельности. Второй работает в России.  Более 20 лет клиент занимается  торговлим строительных материалов. Он покупает некоторые  товары с «баракат» г. Худжанда некоторые товары у поставщиков  и продает их на  своем  магазине. Его жена домохозяйка. Юлдаш с 2011 года кредитуется в нашей организации  и ни разу не нарушал условия организации и целенаправленно использует полученные кредиты. На полученный займ он хочет расширить свой бизнес.
texts.en: Yuldash is involved in selling construction materials.  He is 49 years old, married and has two sons and two daughters.  One of his sons helps Yuldash with this business.  The second son works in Russia.  Yuldash has been involved in the sales of construction materials for over 20 years.  He buys some goods from "Barakat" of the city of Khujand and some from distributors, and sells them in his store.  Yuldash's wife is a homemaker.  Yuldash has been obtaining financing from our organization since 2011.  He has never violated the terms of our organization and used obtained loans as intended.  He wants to use this loan to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Dorjbayar

texts.en:
Dorjbayar, 29 is a railway man and has been doing his job for three years. His monthly income does not usually cover his family's needs. He lives with his wife and his son in the common which is in Kherlen, Mongolia. 

Dorjbayar's apartment was built in the early 1960s, and it has had renovations just a few times since it was built. Now it needs urgent renovations and repairs to some of its parts. In particular, he plans to change its drain pipes and to renovate some other bad parts. As he said, he very wants his family to live in comfortable and good living conditions in the future. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to the purchase of building and decoration materials for his home repair.

loans.use: To purchase building and decoration materials for his home repair.

loans.name: Oswaldo Ernesto

texts.es: Oswaldo Ernesto de treinta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos. Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, sorgo y frijol, tiene mucha experiencia y es muy buen vendedor  últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todo lo que cultiva es de excelente calidad y lo vende a precios bajos, además el servicio es inigualable Oswaldo siempre lleva su producto hasta el lugar que lo necesiten; es un hombre de trabajo siempre aprovechando oportunidades que se le presentan, quiere ver crecer su negocio y  mantenerse adelante de la competencia, piensa que la gente crea su propio éxito aprendiendo lo que necesita aprender, y practicando lo aprendido hasta que te vuelves un experto, es así practicando lo aprendido como se ha decidido a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, sorgo y frijol por mayor. Oswaldo Ernesto tiene la confianza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Oswaldo Ernesto, 32, lives with his common-law wife and children.  He grows corn, sorghum and beans, with much expertise, and is a good salesman.  Lately he has increased his customer base because of his excellent quality crops, which he sells at low prices with unequaled service.  Oswaldo always takes his products wherever they are needed.  He is a hard-working man who takes advantage of every opportunity for growing his business and staying ahead of competition.  He believes people create their own success by learning what they have to and putting it into practice until becoming an expert.  That is how he decided to request a loan through INTEGRAL to buy corn, sorghum and bean seeds wholesale.  Oswaldo Ernesto is confident he can give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy corn, sorghum, and bean seeds wholesale.

loans.name: Byambatsogt

texts.en: Mr. Byambatsogt, 42, is a taxi driver and lives with his three children and his wife in a slum district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Before he used to live in the suburban ger district /a Mongolian nomadic yurt district and almost same with slum district, it has very much air pollution etc./.He has been running his business since 2005 and it is a main income source for this family now, because his wife is unemployed and does her housework and cares for her kids. Byambatsogt raises 10 pigs currently at his backyard. Actually they had started a selling motor engine oils in rental kiosk. But it did not succeeded generally. Therefore he and his wife have been giving importance a taxi business since then. Lately the car has been bad and is damaged in some of its parts. It has a bad influence on his business, decreasing the earnings. He decided to repair and renovate his car. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to purchasing the necessary spare parts and repairing his car. Thank you so much for your understanding his problems.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts and repair his car.

loans.name: Catalino

texts.es: Catalino es de la comarca Potrerillo-Teustepe, casado , tiene 4 hijos de los cuales 3 tienen vida independiente  y la menor de 21 años de edad estudia la carrera de contabilidad publica. Catalino inicio trabajando en un centro de salud a la edad de 18 años con el tiempo fue ahorrando dinero  y a la edad de 25 años se caso. Comenzó  a trabajar en compra y venta de ganado recibiendo  el apoyo de un micro financiera. Hoy  en día se dedica al repasto y ordeño de ganado, el  vende  en Juigalpa aunque  dice le gustaría vender en otros lugares que le ofrecieran un mejor precio. Catalino tiene como expectativa ampliar la crianza  de novillos(vacas) ya que la comercialización  es mas demandada. El  solicita este crédito para comprarle alimento  al ganado lo cual será de ayuda ya que podrá mantener en buen peso y tamaño el ganado.  Uno de sus planes futuros es mejorar la finca.
texts.en:
Catalino is from Potrerillo-Teustepe County.  He is married and has four children, three of which live independently, and the youngest daughter, 21, studies public accounting.  Catalino started working at a health center when he was 18, and began saving his money until he married at the age of 25.  With the support of a micro-loan he began buying and selling livestock for a living.  Now he owns a private farm with dairy cattle, and sells in Juigalpa, although he says he would like to sell elsewhere at better prices.  

Catalino hopes to increase his heads of cattle since there is more market demand.  He is requesting a loan to buy animal feed that will help maintain a good weight and size for his livestock.  One of his goals for the future is to improve his farm.

loans.use: To buy animal feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To make the downpayment on a motor-taxi.

loans.name: Panfilo

texts.es: Pánfilo es originario de Camoapa municipio de Boaco, casado, tiene 4 hijos los cuales todos son mayores de edad, dos de ellos son ingenieros agrónomo quienes le ayudan económicamente. Pánfilo empezó  a trabajar con su padre a la edad de 10 años en la siembra de maíz y trigo su actividad principal es la hortaliza desde hace mas de 20 años  siembra  chiltomas y su cosecha la vende  en Juigalpa y Managua tiene otros ingreso como es la venta de terneros.  La siembra de hortaliza es una de sus actividades favoritas aunque a veces  a tenido perdida por plagas, el siempre sigue adelante. Pánfilo  utilizara  el préstamo para comprar abonos, refrescantes pago de mano de obra para siembra de tomates y chiltomas.  Con este crédito se ayudara para pagar mas trabajadores, tener un buen rendimiento y elevar la calidad de sus producto, sus planes futuros son sembrar en mayores cantidades   proponiéndose  como  meta próxima  sembrar  1 manzanas de chiltomas.
texts.en: Pánfilo is from Camoapa, town of Boaco. He is married and has 4 children, who are all adults. Two of them are agricultural engineers who help him financially. Pánfilo started to work with his father when he was 10 years old, planting corn and wheat. His main activity is planting vegetables, which he has done for 20 years. He plants chiltoma peppers and sells his harvest in Juigalpa and Managua. He also makes income selling calves. Planting vegetables is one of his favorite activities. Although sometimes he suffers losses due to pests, he always keeps going. Pánfilo will use the loan to buy fertilizer and beverages and to pay for more workers in order to have a better yield and improve the quality of his products. His plan for the future is to plant in greater quantities, with his next goal being to plant 1.7 acres of chiltoma peppers.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and beverages and pay for the labor to plant tomatoes and chiltoma peppers.

loans.name: Teodomira

texts.es: Teodomira es socia del Banco Comunal Palmeras, tiene 65 años, se dedica a la venta de carne, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 15 años, gracias a los préstamos recibidos ahora tiene mas ganancias y así ha podido comprar su congeladora, también le ha ayudado en la educación de sus hijos, agradece que siempre están para ayudarla y guiarlas con las capacitaciones. Ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en al compra de carne.
texts.en: Teodomira is 65 years old and a member of the Palmeras communal bank.  She sells meat and has also been a member of Finca Peru for 15 years.  She now has greater earnings, thanks to the loans she’s gotten.  She’s been able to buy her freezer and also help out with her children’s education.  She’s grateful that they are always there to help and guide her through training.  She will use the money from this loan to buy meat.

loans.use: to buy meat.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en: Robert is a 28-year-old resident of Kagadi who has 2 children and runs a business dealing with selling shoes. At first he started by laying bricks, then saved and got capital for the current business which he's had now for 3 years. Price fluctuations, high fuel and transport costs are factors affecting his operations. He would like to build a permanent home and buy a car. His business dream is to expand into new markets. Robert wants a loan to buy more shoes for resale.

loans.use: to buy more shoes for resale.

loans.name: José Guadalupe

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 42 años de edad, esta acompañado, tiene cuatro hijos. Él se dedica a la agricultura desde que era un niño, fue su papá quien le enseño este trabajo. José siembra maíz desde hace varios años junto con su esposa e hijos. Además, presta los servicios de transporte de carga y personas desde el cantón a la ciudad, trabajo que realiza desde las 6:00 a.m. hasta las 7:00 a.m. para luego desplazarse hacia el lugar donde tiene sus cultivos en donde trabaja hasta las 3:00 p.m. su esposa se dedica a vender en una pequeña tienda que poseen, además de ayudarle con el cultivo. 

Los insumos agrícolas para la siembra y los productos para la tienda, los compra en una ciudad, transportándose en su vehiculo desde temprano, con la gente que va a trabajar recorriendo un aproximado de ocho kilómetros. El préstamo que esta solicitando es para mantenimiento de su vehiculo, fortalecimiento de su tienda y para la compra de insumos agrícolas. Con la inversión José podrá obtener mayores ganancias con el vehiculo, ya que podrá transportar más pasajeros y carga, además de surtir la tienda de su esposa. 

Él desea mejorar su vivienda, ya que una parte es de lámina y en el invierno caen muchas goteras, afectando a su familia y a la mercadería de la tienda.
texts.en:
José is 42 years old. He is in a relationship and he has four children. He has been a farmer since he was a child. His father taught him how to do this work. José has grown corn for several years with his wife and children. In addition, he provides transportation services for cargo and passengers from the canton to the city. He does this work from 6:00 a.m. until 7:00 a.m. Later, he moves to the place where he has his crops and works until 3:00 p.m. His wife works at a small store that she owns. She also helps José with the farming. 

The farming supplies  and the products for the store are bought in the city and transported in his vehicle along with the people who go to work covering an area of approximately eight kilometers. The loan he is requesting is for maintenance for his vehicle, for strengthening the store and for purchasing farming supplies. With the investment, José will be able to earn greater profits with the vehicle because he will be able to transport more passengers and cargo in addition to stocking his wife’s store. 

He wants to improve his home since one part is built from sheeting. In the winter, there are many leaks that affect his family and the store’s merchandise.

loans.use: maintain for his vehicle, strengthen the store and purchase farming supplies.

loans.name: Carlos Eduardo

texts.es:
Carlos tiene 28 años de edad, padre de 2 pequeños de 6 años y 3 meses de edad, los cuales son su adoración y razón por la cual él trabaja muy duro para darles lo mejor y que sean felices. Su vivienda se ubica en el distrito de Parcona, Ica, Perú. El distrito de Parcona es conocido por el “Bosque de piedras, el cual es  visitado por los turistas ya que es una agrupación de piedras que tienen la forma de animales, personas, entre otros, asimismo es conocido por la amabilidad de sus pobladores. En su tiempo libre a Carlos le gusta pasar tiempo con sus hijos y escuchar música con ellos, asimismo le encanta que su esposa le cocine uno de sus platillos favoritos, el cual es el riquísimo “Cau Cau”. Debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres el solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar “Ingeniería de Sistemas”.

Día a día Carlos sale a las calles a trabajar en su negocio como chofer de mototaxi, puede atender hasta 40 clientes en el día y trabaja alrededor de 10 horas; asimismo los fines de semana o cuando hay algún evento el trabaja alquilando equipos de sonido y también como DJ, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque se esmera mucho en su trabajo ya que de ello depende que su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida y sean felices.

Carlos está muy agradecido con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a su gran apoyo el podrá comprar una consola nueva para su trabajo como DJ, lo que le permitirá ofrecer un mejor servicio y así seguir luchando por ser mejor cada día y que su familia se sienta orgulloso con él y realizar su gran sueño.” Darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y Tener una discoteca”.
texts.en:
Carlos is 28 years old and the father of 2 children, aged 6 and 3 months. He adores them and they are the reason he works so hard to give them the best and make them happy. His home is located in the Parcona district in Ica, Peru. The Parcona district is known for the "Stone Forest", which is visited by tourists, since it is a grouping of stones that are shaped liked animals and people, among other things. It is also known for the friendliness of its inhabitants. In his free time, Carlos likes to spend time with his children ad listen to music with them. He also loves it when his wife cooks one of his favorite dishes, the delicious “Cau Cau”. Due to his parents' lack of financial resources, he only finished high school, but he would have liked to study computer programming.

Day to day, Carlos goes out to the streets to work in his business as a motorcycle taxi driver. He can serve 40 customers  day and works around 10 hours. On weekends or when there is an event, he works renting out stereo equipment and as a DJ. He thinks it is going well for him in this business because he works really hard and his family depends on it to have a better quality of life and be happy.

Carlos is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their support he will be able to buy a new console for his work as a DJ. This will allow him to offer a better service and keep fighting day to day and for his family to feel proud of him and to make his dream come true: "giving a better quality of life to my family and having a discotheque".

loans.use: to buy a console.

loans.name: San

texts.en:
San, 44, is a rice farmer who is working hard in her business. She happily performs her daily tasks at the rice field with her family. She was born and grew up in Prey Chor district of Kompong Cham province. Now she has been blessed with 6 single children, some of whom are students and still need her support. Growing rice is the primary activity of her family, and another portion of profit is earned from trading red sugar palm juice, managed by her husband.

San has been a client of HKL for a few years. She has already paid off her previous loans and this is her third loan. She will use it to purchase red sugar palm juice from local villagers and her frequent customers for trading. She hopes to have a good return from her investment.

loans.use: to purchase red sugar palm juice for trading.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is 31 years old and married to Esther, and they have seven children. He has been a poultry farmer for the past 5 years. This is his first loan with KADET ltd. He was introduced by a KADET client. He plans to use the loan amount to purchase more chickens to raise. His hopes and dreams are to become a known eggs supplier in the area.

loans.use: to purchase chicks.

loans.name: Eng

texts.en:
Eng, 52, is widower and resides with five children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. He has been running a public transportation service (motor taxi) for over nine years, earning approximately USD 8 per day. Four of his children are employed as garment workers and construction workers. Approximately, they earn USD 16 per day. 

Due to the present motorbike being old, Eng is requesting a loan of USD 600 to purchase a new motorbike to replace the old one for running the business. This purchase would enable him to attract more customers and generate more income to support the family. In the future, he would like to rebuild his present house to make it more comfortable for his family’s living and help his children get bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorbike to replace the old one for running the business.

loans.name: Magsar

texts.en:
Magsar is a 39-year-old carpenter who lives with his family in the outer ger district without basic infrastructure of Ulaabaatar city, Mongolia. His spouse is a doctor for a local kindergarten, and their son and daughter both attend secondary school. 

His previously Kiva loan was for setting up the heating system on his new house, and he installed the system. Now he has repaid his loan and is requesting a 500,000 MNT loan to recover his yard with blocks. 

He is also a very trusted client of Transcapital Co. Ltd.

loans.use: to purchase blocks.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en: Stephen is a 47-year-old gentleman, married with 5 children. He deals in a produce business which he has run for a period of 10 years. He started with agriculture harvested and sold, and got capital to start buying from others. He says price fluctuation and inadequate capital is affecting the business. He would like to educate his children and expand his business to new markets. Stephen wants a loan to buy maize and groundnuts to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize and groundnuts to sell.

loans.name: Mowafaq

texts.en:
Mowafaq is a 50-year-old married man, and the father of three sons and three daughters.

For the past two years, Mowafaq has been driving a pickup car for transferring goods to customers from one place to another, which has been a profitable project, but not enough to cover all the costs.

Mowafaq is requesting a 3,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing his own pickup car. This will enable Mowafaq to have his own pickup car, which will allow him to transfer goods to customers freely without any obligations to others. This will help Mowafaq to increase his work and improve the family's income to better.

Mowafaq is photographed next to the pickup car he will purchase.

loans.use: To complete purchasing a pickup car to use for transferring goods.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy gifts during the Easter season for resale.

loans.name: Benon

texts.en: Benon is a 33-year-old gentleman, married with 5 children. He is a police officer by profession which he has practiced for a period of 12 years.  Benon would like to educate his children and build a permanent home. He wants a loan to buy building materials for the completion of his house and to buy a plot.

loans.use: to buy building materials for the completion of his house and to buy a plot.

loans.name: Maria Tereza

texts.en: Maria Tereza is a 47-year-old lady dealing in a local brew business. She says she has practiced it for 10 years, and that she started with capital she got from baking powder. She faces the problems of inadequate capital to facilitate the business and of customers not paying on time. Maria Tereza would like mostly to build a permanent home. She would also like to move her business to a more permanent location. She wants a loan to buy more local brew for resale.

loans.use: to buy more local brew for resale.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en: Daniel is a 27-year-old gentleman, married with 2 children. He is a teacher by profession which he has practiced for a period of 2 years. Daniel would like to educate his children, buy a car and build a permanent home. He wants a loan to buy bricks, sand and iron sheets for constructing a house.

loans.use: to buy bricks, sand and iron sheets for constructing a house.

loans.name: Rashad

texts.en:
Rashad is a conservative person who prefers not to have his photo published online, so his son appears in his Kiva profile photo.

Rashad is a 59-year-old married man and the father of three sons and four daughters. He is a farmer who works cultivating olive trees and vegetables which he sells to customers. For the past ten years, he has also been raising and selling sheep and sheep products, which has been a profitable project, but not enough to cover all the costs.

Rashad is requesting a 1,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing additional numbers of sheep in order to increase the profit. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

loans.use: To increase the number of sheep he is raising.

loans.name: Etta

texts.en:
Etta lives in Compound #3. She is 50 years old, married, and has 8 children between the ages of 14 and 33. They all live on their own or are attending  college. For the past twelve years she has been selling used clothes in the market. She started this business with the help of her mother.

Etta is requesting a loan to purchase more used clothes for her business. Her plan is to support her children in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothes for her business.

loans.name: Margret

texts.en: Margret is 40 years old, married, and lives in Compound #3 along with 4 children between 1 and 16 years old. Three of them are in school and all of them live at home. For 6 years now she has been selling rice and oil. She likes the way customers respond to her business. She learned this way of selling from her mother. Margret is requesting a loan to buy more rice and oil for her business. In future she wants to send her children on to higher education (college).

loans.use: to buy more rice and oil for her business.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es: Felicitas es socia del Banco Comunal Palmeras, lleva ropa a las ferias, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 2 años, pero antes estuvo 10 años, ella esta muy satisfecha porque pudo sacar profesionales a sus hijos con la ayuda de Finca, siempre trato de inculcarles buenos valores y con las capacitaciones de Finca le ayudaron a poder tener una buena base para la educación de sus hijos, recuerda mucho las enseñanzas de la Morenita y siempre la lleva presente en el corazón, para ella Finca ocupa un lugar muy grande en su vida. Ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en al compra de ropa.
texts.en:
Felicitas is a member of Banco Comunal Palmeras. She takes clothing to the fairs, and has been a member of Finca Peru for two years, but was previously a member for 10 years. 

She is very content because she was able see her children become professionals with the help of Finca.  She has always tried to instill in them good values and with the trainings of Finca she helped to provide a good foundation for the education of her children.  She remembers well the teachings of La Morenita, and she always carries them in her heart. For her, Finca occupies a big place in her life.  

Now with the loan she will invest it to buy clothing.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en: Susan is a 26-year-old single mother of three children. She is a charcoal seller and has been in the business for the past four years. This is her first loan with Kadet ltd. She was introduced by a Kadet client. She plans to use the loan to purchase 30 sacks of charcoal to increase her stock. Her hopes and dreams are to be a known supplier of charcoal in her area.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of charcoal.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is 34 years old, married to Samuel, and they have three children. She is a timber dealer and has been in the business for the past 12 years. This is her first loan with Kadet. She was introduced by a Kadet client. She will use the loan to purchase a stock of timber for resale.

She hopes to own a plot of land and build rental houses.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of timber.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos es originario de Malacatoya- Granada, pero habita en Teustepe municipio de Boaco, casado, padre de 5 hijos todos mayores de edad. El inicio trabajando con otros productores de la misma comunidad  a los 12 años de edad, el ha recibido siempre el apoyo de su mama que le ayuda con la elaboración de pan y actualmente el de sus hijos, a los 20 años decidió independizarse y empezó a trabajar por si solo sembrando maíz, tomate y chiltomas apoyado en su actividad por MiCrédito. Le gustaría vender sus productos en otros lugares a un mejor precio, siendo esta su actividad principal la venta de maíz es uno de los productos que le genere buenos ingresos. El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar abono, plaguicidas y gasolina para bomba de riego para tener una buena producción de maíz. Sus planes futuros es seguir trabajando y comprar más maquinaria de trabajo, su meta a próxima es comprar 1,5 manzana de varios cultivos de hortaliza.
texts.en: Carlos is from Malacatoya, Granada but he lives in Teustepe in the city of Boaco. He is married and the father of 5 children who are all older in age. He started working with other growers in the same community when he was twelve years old. He always received support from her mom and help with making bread and now, help for his children. At the age of twenty, he decided to become independent and started to work for himself by growing corn, tomatoes and sweet peppers. His work is supported by MiCrédito. He would like to sell his products in other places at a better price. His main business is selling corn since it is one of the products generates good income. The loan will be used to purchase fertilizers, pesticides and gasoline for the irrigation pump, so he can have good corn production. His future plans are to continue working and purchase more machinery for work. His next goal is to purchase a variety of apples.

loans.use: purchase fertilizers, pesticides and gasoline for the irrigation pump.

loans.name: Marcelle Reine A.

texts.fr: Marcelle Reine est célibataire sans enfant. Elle vend des pagnes bazin, tenues, verres et divers produits depuis deux ans. Marcelle Reine s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés de la place. Ses clients sont les femmes et les hommes. Elle veut s'acheter un et démi balle de bazin, des verres et les produits divers. Marcelle Reine aimerait changer son mode de vie avec le revenu supplémentaire.
texts.en:
Marcelle Reine is a single woman without children. She has been selling bazin pagnes (a damask fabric), clothing, glasses and various other items for two years. She buys her merchandise at a local market. Her clientele consists of both men and women. 

She plans to buy one and a half bale of bazin, glasses, and other items. She hopes that the additional income will help her to change her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy 10 bazins and 5 cartons of glasses.

loans.name: Khadra

texts.en:
Khadra is a 50-year-old conservative woman, so she asked her husband to take her place in the photo.
 
Her husband, Mohammad, bought some heavy equipment such as compressors after his retirement, and he started a rental business along with freelancing.

Now some of the equipment he has needs maintenance, and Khadra has applied for this loan to help her husband repair the equipment and buy more to expand his business.

loans.use: To help her husband do maintenance on his rental equipment and buy more.

loans.name: Ibtisam

texts.en:
Ibtisam is a 44-year-old conservative lady, so she has asked her husband to appear in the photo instead of her.

Ibtisam has four children to support with her husband. She has a small grocery store in a separated room that belongs to her house. Her husband works in animal sales.

Ibtisam has applied for this loan to buy more food products for the store so she can expand later and open a mini-market in the neighborhood.

loans.use: to buy more food products for the store.

loans.name: Maria De Lourdes

texts.es:
María de Lourdes tiene 38 años de edad es soltera no tiene hijos, vive sola en Chillanes provincia de Bolívar.
La VRC VIRGEN DE BAÑOS está formada por en la comunidad mama Sara de Cerritos, los socios se dedican la mayor parte de su tiempo en la agricultura, siembra de maíz y crianza de animales.
María de Lourdes se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, fréjol, tomate y mora. Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, abonos, fertilizantes, urea, insecticidas. Las compras y las ventas lo hará en San Pablo de Atenas.
Con la ayuda del crédito podrá mejorar los cultivos y podrá comprar los abonos.  Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es mejorar la situación económica de la familia.
En el tiempo libre le gusta ir de paseo, hacer deporte y le gusta el día del niño.
texts.en:
María de Lourdes is 38 years old, she is single and has no children. She lives alone in Chillanes, in the Bolivar province.
The “Virgen de Baños” communal bank is composed of the Cerritos Mama Sara community. The members spend most of their time farming, growing corn and raising animals.
María de Lourdes is a farmer: she plants maize, beans, tomatoes and blackberries. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy supplies, manure, fertilizers, urea and insecticides. She will buy supplies and sell her products in San Pablo de Atenas.
Thanks to the loan she will improve her crops and she will be able to buy manure. Improving the economic conditions of her family is the greatest challenge she has to face.
In her free time she likes going out for a stroll and practicing sport. She also likes the celebrations for Children’s Day.

loans.use: To buy supplies, manure, fertilizers, urea and insecticides.

loans.name: Taghreed

texts.en:
Taghreed, a 30-year-old married woman, has two daughters and a son. Her husband has two jobs: One is with a governmental entity; the other is at home making sweets to sell.

Taghreed helps her husband by preparing different types of sweets while he is at his work in the daytime, so he can start selling them after he gets home.

Now Taghreed has applied for this loan in order to buy new pots and some kitchen tools to increase the quantity of sweets they make so they can start distributing to shops.

loans.use: to buy new pots and some kitchen tools.

loans.name: Yusra

texts.en:
Yusra is a 23-year-old conservative married lady, so she has asked her husband, Rafat, to take her place in the photo.

Yusra is a housewife who is taking care of her three daughters. Rafat is the one supporting the family. He has a scrap shop where he also sell spare parts. He wants to add a new section for repairing household equipment such as refrigerators and washers.
 
Yusra wants to help her husband expand his business, so she has applied for this loan to start his new section for repairing.

loans.use: to open a new section in the store for machinery repairing.

loans.name: Israa

texts.en:
Israa is a 22-year-old conservative married lady, so she asked her father-in-law to take her place in the photo.

Israa has two sons and a daughter. She is married to a military man who came home after his duty was over to start working in their small business, which is selling gas canisters. Unfortunately, they were not able to have a special store for selling those gas canisters, so they bought a few and put them in a room to sell them.

Now they want to expand, but for their safety and their children’s, Israa has applied for a loan in order to have a store outside the house and increase the number of canisters they have so they can also distribute them around their neighborhood.

loans.use: To open a store for selling gas canisters.

loans.name: Rehab

texts.en:
Rehab is a 47-year-old single woman. She has a small knitting and embroidery business to support herself.

She has applied for this loan to increase her productivity and buy more thread and yarn so that she can open a shop for selling her handcrafts.

loans.use: to buy more yarn and thread.

loans.name: Danaya Group

texts.fr:
Toutes mariées dans des familles traditionnelles élargies, les femmes du groupe   Danaya   ont  en moyenne 37 ans et 5 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans la ville de Koutiala,  région de Sikasso (3ème région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, de parenté et de leurs activités professionnelles. Elles font l’achat et la vente des  condiments, du savon, du poisson, des pagnes et des chaussures. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso  et sont à leur  1er prêt solidaire.
Madame, Mariam ( la première arrêtée de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo) est une grande vendeuse de pagne. Mariam est très sollicitée et appréciée pour la qualité de ses pagnes car elle vend les habits qui sont à la mode. 
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, des pagnes de diverses sortes, auprès des grossistes de la place et effectue ses ventes en détail, au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Avec ce prêt, Madame  Mariam espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 40.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge certains besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
The members of the Danaya group are married women living in extended traditional families. On average, they are 37 years old and they have five children each. They live in the city of Koutiala, in Sikasso (3rd administrative region of Mali), and they know each other as neighbors, as colleagues, and through ties of kinship. They buy and sell condiments, soap, fish, pagnes and shoes.

To increase their working capital, the group members joined the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution. This is their first group loan. 

Mrs. Mariam (first from the left) is an important seller of pagnes. She is in high demand due to the quality of her merchandise, which is very trendy. She plans to use her loan to buy various types of pagnes from local wholesalers. She conducts her sales at retail, for cash or credit, to a clientele consisting of both men and women.

Mrs. Mariam hopes that this loan will help her to earn an average monthly profit of 40,000 CFAF, which she will reinvest in her activity and use to cover some of the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy pagnes for resale.

loans.name: Cristian Patricio

texts.es:
Cristian Patricio tiene 28 años de edad es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de 4 y 2 años de edad en Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.
La VRC VIRGEN DE BAÑOS está formada por en la comunidad mama Sara de Cerritos, los socios se dedican la mayor parte de su tiempo en la agricultura, siembra de maíz y crianza de animales.
Cristian Patricio  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y fréjol. Solicita el crédito para comprar abonos, fertilizantes, líquidos para la maleza. Las compras y las ventas lo hará en Chillanes.
Con la ayuda del crédito podrá mejorar los cultivos de maíz y fréjol.  Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es pagar puntual el crédito.
En el tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte y las fiestas de la navidad.
texts.en:
Cristian Patricio is 28 years old, he is married and he lives in Chillanes, in the Bolívar province, with his wife and their children aged 4 and 2.
The “Virgen de Baños” communal bank is composed of the Cerritos Mama Sara community. The members spend most of their time farming, growing corn and raising animals.
Cristian Patricio is a farmer: he plants maize and beans. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy manure, fertilizers and weed killers. He will buy supplies and sell his products in Chillanes.
Thanks to the loan he will succeed in improving his maize and beans crops. Being punctual in repaying the loan is his great challenge.
In his free time he likes practicing sports, he also likes Christmas.

loans.use: To buy manure, fertilizers and weed killers.

loans.name: Andrea Alejandra

texts.es: La Sra. Andrea  tiene 23 años no es casada pero tiene un  hijo de la edad de 1 años,   ella se dedica al servicio de alquiler de salón de fiestas para distintos acontecimientos sociales ya sea matrimonios, bautizos, fiestas de promociones, etc. Su salón se encuentra ubicado en la zona de San Miguel,  este préstamo es su tercera secuencia dentro de la institución, Andrea  utilizara este  este préstamo es para la compra de juego de sillas plásticas para su negocio, la razón para solicitar este préstamo es necesidad de reemplazar sus sillas antiguas por unas nuevas. La Sra. Andrea enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que existen una gran cantidad de salones de fiesta que prestan estos servicios y utilizara los beneficios del crédito para seguir comprando  sillas y algunas cosas que le faltan para adornar su salón,  Andrea sueña para su negocio es ofrecer servicios de salón de fiestas mejorado mediante la ampliación de su infraestructura.
texts.en: Andrea is 23 years old and the single mother of a one year old son.  She rents out a large hall for parties and different social events, including weddings, baptisms, promotions, etc.  Her hall is located in the San Miguel zone.  This will be her third loan through the institution. Andrea will use the money from this loan to buy plastic chairs for her business.  She needs to replace her old chairs with new ones.  Andrea faces business challenges such as competition because there are many festival halls that provide these services.  She will use the benefit of these loans to continue buying chairs and some other things that she needs to decorate her hall.  Andrea dreams of expanding her business infrastructure to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy chairs.

loans.name: Zamzam

texts.en:
Zamzam is a 43-year-old married woman. Her husband works in a restaurant. They have six members to support in the family.

Zamzam has a small home business making embroidery dresses by order. She hopes that one day she can open an embroidery workshop and make a large quantity of dresses to distribute around the shops in the market.

Now she has applied for this loan to buy more colorful threads to complete her orders.

loans.use: to buy more colorful threads.

loans.name: Hanadi

texts.en:
Hanadi is a conservative young lady, so she has asked her mother to take her place in the photo.

Hanadi is a 27-year-old married lady. Her husband works as an office boy at one of the Jordanian governmental entities. They have three children.

To help her husband in supporting the family, Hanadi started a small retail business at home, selling blankets and home products as shown in the picture.

She has applied for this loan to bring in more types of home products to increase her revenue.

loans.use: to bring in more types of home products.

loans.name: Martha Lourdes

texts.es:
Martha Lourdes tiene 37 años de edad es viuda  tiene 7 hijos, vive con los hijos de 21, 17, 15, 13, 10, 8 y 8 meses de edad en Chillanes provincia de Bolívar.
La VRC VIRGEN DE BAÑOS está formada por en la comunidad mama Sara de Cerritos, los socios se dedican la mayor parte de su tiempo en la agricultura, siembra de maíz y crianza de animales.
Martha Lourdes se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, fréjol, mora, además a la cría ganados y pollos. Solicita el crédito para comprar abonos, fertilizantes, urea, insecticidas. Las compras y las ventas lo hará en San Pablo de Atenas.
Con la ayuda del crédito podrá combatir a las plagas, lanchas.  Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es el mal clima cómo las heladas en los cultivos.
En el tiempo libre le gusta ver televisión, dedicarse a los hijos, disfrutar de las fiestas del señor de la misericordia de San Pablo.
texts.en:
Martha Lourdes is 37 years old, she is a widow and she has 7 children aged 21, 17, 15, 13, 10, 8 and 8 months. They live with her in Chillanes, in the Bolívar province.
The “Virgen de Baños” communal bank is composed of the Cerritos Mama Sara community. The members spend most of their time farming, growing corn and raising animals.
Martha Lourdes is a farmer: she plants maize, beans and blackberries. On to of this she also breeds cattle and chickens. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy manure, fertilizers, urea and insecticides. She will buy supplies and sell her products in San Pablo de Atenas.
Thanks to the loan she will be able to fight pests and hoarfrosts. Harsh climate, such as frosts, is the main challenge for her crops. 
In her free time she likes watching television, and taking care of her children. She also enjoys the celebration in San Pablo for El Señor de la Misericordia (Our Lord of Mercy).

loans.use: To buy manure, fertilizers, urea and insecticides.

loans.name: Inas

texts.en:
Inas is a 31-year-old conservative lady, so she asked her husband, Yasser, to take her place in the photo.

Inas and Yasser have one son. Yasser owns a restaurant and works there.

Inas wanted to start her own business too, so she started selling home products, mainly kitchenware. 

Now she has applied for this loan to increase the quantity she has in her inventory, in hopes that she can open her own home products showroom in the future.

loans.use: To add more home products to what she sells.

loans.name: Niveen

texts.en:
Niveen, 24 years old and a conservative lady, has asked her husband to take her place in the photo.

Niveen is a housewife who is taking care of her three children; her husband has two jobs, one is a house painter, the other managing his small grocery store. Niveen also helps in the grocery store by taking his place when he has a painting job to do.

Now Niveen has applied for this loan to improve the store and add more food products that have been requested by their customers.

loans.use: to add more food products

loans.name: Olga Maria

texts.es:
Olga María tiene 52 años de edad es viuda tiene dos hijos, vive con los hijos en Chillanes provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC VIRGEN DE BAÑOS está formada por en la comunidad mama Sara de Cerritos, los socios se dedican la mayor parte de su tiempo en la agricultura, siembra de maíz y crianza de animales.

Olga María se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, trigo, fréjol, tomate y mora. Solicita el crédito para comprar abonos, fertilizantes, urea, insecticidas. Las compras y las ventas lo hará en Chillanes cada semana.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá mejorar la producción y cosecha.  Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es que los hijos sean profesionales, que los terrenos rindan una mejor producción.

En el tiempo libre le gusta ver televisión y participar en las fiestas del niño Jesús.
texts.en:
Olga María is 52 years old, she is a widow and she has 2 children who live with her in Chillanes, in the Bolívar province.

The “Virgen de Baños” communal bank is composed of the Cerritos Mama Sara community. The members spend most of their time farming, growing corn and raising animals.

Olga María is a farmer: she plants maize, wheat, beans, tomatoes and blackberries. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy manure, fertilizers, urea and insecticides. She will buy supplies and sell her products every week in Chillanes.

Thanks to the loan she will succeed in improving her production and her harvests. The main challenges she has to face are the education of her children (she wants them to be professionals) and to get a better production from her lands.

In her free time she likes watching television and taking part in the celebrations for the Niño Jesús (Child Jesus)

loans.use: To buy manure, fertilizers, urea and insecticides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise for her grocery store.

loans.name: Wazo Tegeta Group

texts.en:
Evarist, who is in his early 30s, is married and has one son who goes to school. He has been owning a retail shop for three years now. He works from 7:00 am to 10:00 pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Evarist's 4th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to increase stock items and pay household expenses.  He has paid back all his loans successfully.  He wants a new loan to increase the inventory for his retail shop.  His dream is to one day be able to expand his business.

Evarist will share this loan with his loan group "Wazo Tegeta," which has a total of 15 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy inventory for his store

loans.name: Rahmeh

texts.en:
Rahmeh, a 46-year-old married woman, has eight sons and daughters. Her husband started working in an animal sales business after his retirement from the military.

Rahmeh has her own small home business. She uses the milk she gets from her husband’s sheep to make ordinary yogurt and Jordanian special yogurt called "jameed".
